ygData.msgSnippet: A robot darkened the doorway from behind the others. I would. said the voice, with little emotion left, and a sound of a robot who is drained. Firedrill...

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

A robot darkened the doorway from behind the others. "I would." said the
voice, with little emotion left, and a sound of a robot who is drained.

"Firedrill..." Hoist exclaimed. "Where have you been? Did you catch up
with those kidnappers?" 

Firedrill shot Hoist a chilling look, which made Hoist realise the
stupid question. Just looking at Firedrill you could tell he was bashed
up, and Cliffjumpers disapearance was bothering him.

Beachcomber joined the rest, also looking worse for wear.
